positions.subtitle: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
positions.description: Gopali Youth Welfare Society, one of Indiaâ€™s largest government registered student-run NGOs, run by a team of 100+ IIT Kharagpur students, spread across 11 states across the country in various colleges, reaching out to about 15,000+ beneficiaries nationwide.â€¢ Supervised the Panel Discussion event of YUVA (The first-ever social fest of GYWS) which attracted 100+ attendeesâ€¢ Successful in printing 3 articles in various media houses about the work done by GYWS in response to COVID-19â€¢ Fostering long term ties and building relations with local media houses to spread awareness about the work doneâ€¢ Handled the Instagram page of GYWS and devised online and offline national level publicity strategies for GYWSâ€¢ Led a team of 16 freshmen, guided them in content writing for social media handles of GYWS
positions.title: Senior Executive Member
positions.description_html:
Gopali Youth Welfare Society, one of Indiaâ€™s largest government registered student-run NGOs, run by a team of 100+ IIT Kharagpur students, spread across 11 states across the country in various colleges, reaching out to about 15,000+ beneficiaries nationwide.

â€¢ Supervised the Panel Discussion event of YUVA (The first-ever social fest of GYWS) which attracted 100+ attendees
â€¢ Successful in printing 3 articles in various media houses about the work done by GYWS in response to COVID-19
â€¢ Fostering long term ties and building relations with local media houses to spread awareness about the work done
â€¢ Handled the Instagram page of GYWS and devised online and offline national level publicity strategies for GYWS
â€¢ Led a team of 16 freshmen, guided them in content writing for social media handles of GYWS

positions.subtitle: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
